# paymentMode

**Instance Property**

The payment mode for a subscription offer on an auto-renewable subscription that applies to the transaction.

## Declaration

```swift
let paymentMode: Transaction.Offer.PaymentMode?
```

## Discussion

You set up subscription offers and determine the payment mode when you configure subscriptions in App Store Connect. For more information about the Free Trial ([doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Transaction/Offer-swift.struct/PaymentMode-swift.struct/freeTrial]), Pay As You Go ([doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Transaction/Offer-swift.struct/PaymentMode-swift.struct/payAsYouGo]), and Pay Up Front ([doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Transaction/Offer-swift.struct/PaymentMode-swift.struct/payUpFront]) payment modes, see [https://developer.apple.com/help/app-store-connect/reference/pricing-and-availability].

## Getting offer details

- **id**: A string that identifies an offer that applies to the transaction.
- **type**: The type of offer that applies to the transaction.
- **Transaction.OfferType**: The types of offers that apply to a transaction.
- **Transaction.Offer.PaymentMode**: The payment modes for offers that apply to a transaction.
- **period**: The duration of the offer applied to a transaction.
